question.body: Which of the following is not properly matched with its description?

multiple_choice.choice: Mucus - protects the stomach lining from acid.
HCl - Kill bacteria and disrupted the protein structure
Intrinsic factor - absorption of vitamin B 12

response.feedback: Incorrect. The mucus of the gastric juice helps protect the lining of the stomach from the acidity.
Incorrect. HCl kills a lot of bacteria and also helps denature proteins.
Incorrect. Intrinsic factor plays a role in the absorption of vitamin B 12 .
Correct. Pepsinogen is an in active form that can be activated to pepsin. Pepsin can digest proteins.
